Sample Browser Code Source will be availaible in future ??
I think will be very very interesting the Sample Browser code source.
Thanks for your proposal.  We are recreating the Sample Browser based on users' feedback.  We will consider sharing the source code in future after the new version.
Thanks, it would beinteresting sharing source code about Sample Browser and Sample Browser VS extension. Big All in one code.

Thanks, it would beinteresting sharing source code about Sample Browser v3 and v4 too, and Sample Browser VS extension. "All in one" source code in All in one. Great.

Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework Sample Browser v4 Released
So what about the "Looking for experts to review code" notice? Do you want someone to review the samples?
Only Browsers source code and samples...i'm not expert, maybe someday, would be grateful review code...

Jialiang wrote:

Thanks for your proposal.  We are recreating the Sample Browser based on users' feedback.  We will consider sharing the source code in future after the new version.

 

Will you consider sharing the source code of Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework Sample Browser v5 ?? Thanks.

Hello

It's one of our key effort in the following one year to try making the Sample Browser open-source.  We are also thinking about developing a Windows 8 Metro Style version of Sample Browser and share its source code.

Next time if you see my lack of reply in this forum, please directly send an email to onecode@microsoft.com.  I will reply right away :)

Thanks
Jialiang Ge

Thanks Jialiang

I think it would be interesting too share Sample Browser older versions,and Windows 8 Metro Style version .
And I think it would be interesting samples about html5 like http://mashable.com/2012/05/16/prometheus-html5-ie/
"Beyond just creating examples of great HTML5 content, Microsoft is also focused on sharing these skills back with the community.

Gavin says that Microsoft will be publishing some of the libraries used for the Training Center on GitHub in the near future. We think that’s pretty cool.

http://mashable.com/2012/05/16/prometheus-html5-ie/"
